page.title: 01"A School Monday!"
page.content:
I wake up around 8.00am and I get dressed. I have a breakfast of {cereal}and{tea.} At 8.45am I start walking to school.
School starts at 9.00am.After the register two other friends and I go and do the{weather. Before morning break we do{maths}and go on the{computer}. We have break at 10.30am. After break we either have {science}or{topic.} We have our lunch at 12.00 midday and I stay for sandwiches. After lunch we have a{story}and at 2.15pm we have afternoon break. After break we do{P.E.}We leave school at 3.30pm.When I get home I program my {computer}. I have my tea around 6.00pm and after tea I watch{T.V.} {I am including our weather records for {the month of June 1985 on Page 2.
